content.webTitle: Observer Food Monthly Awards 2012 Best independent retailer: Runners up

fields.headline: Observer Food Monthly Awards 2012 Best independent retailer: Runners up
fields.bodyText: LONDON The Ginger Pig Incredibly popular butcher, whose excellence stems from rearing its own rare breeds on the Yorkshire moors. Branches in Hackney, Borough, Shepherd's Bush, Waterloo and Marylebone; thegingerpig.co.uk East London Steak Company Choose your own steaks and know exactly which cow they came from. Delivery within 24 hrs for London. 27-29 Fowler Road, Hainault, Essex, IG6 3UT; 020 7060 5328, eastlondonsteak.co.uk SOUTH & WEST Riverford Online Their huge range of fruit and veg boxes, as well as organic meat, are the main draw but there's plenty more on offer at the Devon farm. Wash Farm, Buckfastleigh, Devon, TQ11 0JU; 01803 762 059, riverford.co.uk Papadeli Everything you want from a well-stocked deli plus cookery classes to make the best of your order. 84 Alma Road, Clifton, Bristol, BS8 2DJ; 0117 973 6569, papadeli.co.uk MIDLANDS Westin Gourmet This extensive online butchers is exceptional value for money, with a huge selection of first-class meat available for delivery. 0115 979 8439, westingourmet.co.uk Delilah Fine Foods Award-winning deli – which has just moved to a new home – with incredible choice and tapas-style bar so you can sample the goods. 12 Victoria Street, Nottingham, NG1 2EX; 0115 948 4461, delilahfinefoods.co.uk EAST The Wholefood Store Friendly, family-run shop stocking more than 2,000 products, over half of which are certified organic. 26 High Street, Manningtree, Essex, CO11 1AJ; 01206 391 200, the-wholefoodstore.co.uk Gog Magog Hills Take your pick from a whole range of fresh foods at this delightful farm shop, deli and butcher. Heath Farm, Shelford Bottom, Cambridge, CB22 3AD; 01223 248 352, gogmagoghills.com NORTH Keelham Farm Shop A family-run, community-focused farm shop selling and celebrating the best of Yorkshire's local produce. Brighouse & Denholme Road, Thornton, Bradford, Yorkshire, BD13 3SS; 01274 833 472, keelhamfarmshop.co.uk Fancie Cupcakes A must-visit for all sweet-tooths; gorgeous cupcakes, traybakes and macaroons made by a small, dedicated team. Shops in Sheffield at Sharrowvale Road, Meadowhall and Winter Gardens; fancie.co.uk WALES Gower Cottage Brownies Original, dairy-free and gluten-free brownies, all beautifully wrapped by hand. Gower Cottage, Reynoldston, Swansea, SA3 1AD; 01792 390 011, gowercottagebrownies.com SCOTLAND Simon Howie Butchers Family-run with meat from their own Perthshire farm. Shops in Auchterarder and Perth; simonhowiefoods.co.uk NORTHERN IRELAND Arcadia Deli The Brown family has kept Belfast's best deli going for nearly 80 years. A must for olive fans. 378 Lisburn Road, Belfast, BT9 6GL, 028 9038 1779, arcadiadeli.co.uk
